title: Fist - Turn the Hell On (1980)
description:
Fist - Turn the Hell On (1980) MP3 320

Dave Irwin - guitar, background vocals
John Wylie - bass guitar, background vocals
Keith Satchfield - vocals, guitar
Harry Hill - drums

Fist was one of those lesser known NWOBHM bands whose reputation and influence never really pushed much beyond cult obsession.  

The bandÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s Turn the Hell On debut still sounds great some thirty years later, particularly with this well-packaged Metal Mind reissue. Standing somewhere between Motorhead, Maiden and Mercyful Fate sonically, the Fist quartet possessed more songwriting chops than most, while also elevating these tracks with a heaping dose of energy and innocent, fire-driven aggression. 

As a result, Turn the Hell On is an up-and-down joyride of vintage metal composition, taking great care in making sure each melodic elementÃ¢â‚¬â€whether vocal or stringÃ¢â‚¬â€is counterbalanced by an equal feeling of devil-may-care swagger.

02. The Watcher

04. You'll Never Get Me Up (In One Of Those) 
05. Forever Amber
